responses: Hi, how can I help you?
How can I help you today?

patterns: What are the prerequisites for CSC492
responses: The prerequisites are CSC301, CSC321, and CSC481

patterns: What are the prerequisites for CSC121
responses: The prerequisites for CSC121 are CSC115 and MAT153 or consent from an instructor

patterns: What are the prerequisites for CSC123
responses: The prerequisite for CSC123 is CSC121

patterns: What are the prerequisites for CSC221
responses: The prerequisite for CSC221 is CSC121

patterns: how many electives do you need for CSC
responses: You need one lower division and at least 2 upper division electives

patterns: what are the lower division requirements for a computer science degree
responses: MAT191, MAT193, MAT271, MAT281, PHY30, PHY132,CSC121, CSC123, CSC221, and 1 CSC elective

patterns: what are the upper division requirements for a computer science degree
responses: CSC311, CSC321, CSC331, CSC341, CSC301, CSC401, CSC481, CSC492, MAT321, MAT361, and at least 2 CSC electives

The requirements for a bachelor's degree in Computer Science can be found at 

 http://csudh.smartcatalogiq.com/2019-2020/Catalog/Copy-of-Computer-Science/Bachelor-of-Science-in-Computer-Science

patterns: Can I make an appointment for advisement
responses:
You may fill out a form to obtain an appointment by visiting 

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdxDBweRXEnppap6-X_9jt6-9a138Dv_VUpgK0G3LhPmzLQbg/viewform

patterns: How many classes can I fail
what is the minimum gpa required
responses:
The minimum gpa required to continue classes is 2.0, if you'd like more info you can visit

 https://www.csudh.edu/uac/academic-probation-disqualification/
